plugin.name: junit-web-runner
plugin.author: Lim Chee Kin
plugin.title: Grails JUnit Web Runner Plugin
plugin.description: \ Grails JUnit Web Runner Plugin is created based on Kotori Web JUnit Runner project (http://code.google.com/p/kotori/) which is a JUnit Runner GWT application that helps to run in-container test cases on grails application. Test cases execution in Google App Engine(GAE) Development or Production Server is supported.
